channel.title: Allowing 'fullscreen' interfaces to 'go-fullscreen'
channel.description:
Okay, I'm (trying) to use interface 15244 (the welcome screen) and this is what happens: http://i1041.photobucket.com/albums/b418/AfterLifeLochie/Server%20Development/problem.png
Is there any way to hide the lower and rightmost panels to allow the interface to show, or, is there another way to do it?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Allowing 'fullscreen' interfaces to 'go-fullscreen'
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

The welcome screen has its own frame, 176.

Read through the packet data and this is what I was able to come up with

public void sendFrame176(int a, int b, int c, int d, int e) { outStream.createFrame(176); outStream.writeByteC(a); outStream.writeWordA(b); outStream.writeByte(c); outStream.writeDWord(d); outStream.writeWord(e); }
int d in this case can not be equal to 0, and the current shown interface has to be -1.

Still playing with it but that’s what I was able to find at this point.

Read full topic
